EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify country profile subscrivers of an upcoming event
EmailTemplate.name: Currency Center Event Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming action regarding {!Country_Profile__c.Country_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Currency Center users,
This serves to inform you about an upcoming event regarding your subscribed country(ies).
Should you have any queries, please log a case in your IATA Customer Portal under the topic "Currency Center".
Kind regards Currency Center Team
